aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Bakırcılar Group is a holding company that adds value to the Turkish economy with its leading companies in different sectors.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Our holding journey, which was founded with Bakırcılar Packaging in 1990, continues for more than 30 years with a sustainable growth and sectoral diversity strategy. With the experience and trust we have gained in the packaging sector since our establishment, we have become a strong group company by investing in different sectors.
story.paragraph2: Today, we operate in a wide range from packaging solutions to software development, business consulting to real estate investments, automotive services to e-commerce platforms. In every sector, we prioritize customer satisfaction and do not compromise on our quality product and service approach.
story.paragraph3: With more than 500 employees, thousands of happy customers and our continuously expanding business network, we continue to add value to the Turkish economy. With our innovative approach, environmentally friendly production mindset and human-centered business model, we are building the future together.

aboutPage.visionDetailed: As Turkey's leading multi-sector holding, to reach a leading position in our sectors with sustainable growth and innovative solutions. To be active in international markets and become a global brand.
aboutPage.missionDetailed: To add value to society and the economy by providing the highest quality products and services to our customers. To build a sustainable future by investing in the development of our employees and achieve long-term success with our stakeholders.
